thread.title: Reliance Communications in talks with Vodafone Idea BSNL for 2G-ICR deal
thread.title_full: Reliance Communications in talks with Vodafone Idea BSNL for 2G-ICR deal

title: Reliance Communications in talks with Vodafone Idea BSNL for 2G-ICR deal
text:
Reliance Communications in talks with Vodafone, Idea, BSNL for 2G-ICR deal 
Times Of India Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Reliance Communications is eyeing a 2G pact similar to 3G-intra-circle roaming in order to continue services in Bihar, Assam and West Bengal once its spectrum expires in December....
